roleset.name: make a strong connection with

example.name: all args
example.text: Mr. Coleman said this week that he would devote the remainder of the political season to positive campaigning , but the truce lasted only hours .

propbank.arg: the remainder of the political season

example.name: omitted arg2
example.text: Under the circumstances , Dataproducts said , Mr. Tomash said he was unable to devote the time required because of other commitments .

example.name: passive
example.text: As publisher of a magazine devoted to movies as guideposts for fashion and other fantasies , Ms. Volokh sees her party - giving as an important part of business .

propbank.arg: to movies as guideposts for fashion and other fantasies

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: As Tang explains : " In the spa , particular attention is devoted to the pleasuring and relaxation of the senses of smell , hearing , touch , taste , and vision .

propbank.arg: to the pleasuring and relaxation of the senses of smell , hearing , touch , taste , and vision

example.name: all args
example.text: His devotion of the remainder of the poltical season to campaigning is evident .

propbank.arg: of the remainder of the poltical season

example.name: argM only. When it is ok to us goal rather than arg 2
example.text: I would definitely love to meet a person who would and be their friend lol .... devotion to the next level
